CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 5, 1946, pg. 9, reads: "Beauty Shop Owners Committee Members - Among the members of the Beauty Shop Owners, Inc., Convention committee is the quintette pictured here. These women, assisted by a corps of committee members, have planned a full and interesting program for the approaching Oct. 6 to 8 first annual convention of the shop owners.  Front row, Mrs. Sally Gilbert and Mrs. Veola Jones.  Back row, Mrs. Beatrice Wilborne, Mrs. Anna Green and Mrs. Charlotte Garrison. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five beauty shop owners, including Sally Gilbert and Veola Jones in front row, and Beatrice Wilborne, Anna Green, and Charlotte Garrison standing behind them, in front of dark curtain in Harris Studio
